scripts.start:users-service:3001: PORT=3001 pm2 start src/users-service/index.ts --interpreter ts-node --name users-service-3001
scripts.start:users-service:3002: PORT=3002 pm2 start src/users-service/index.ts --interpreter ts-node --name users-service-3002
scripts.start:appointment-service:4001: PORT=4001 pm2 start src/appointment-service/index.ts --interpreter ts-node --name appointment-service-4001
scripts.start:appointment-service:4002: PORT=4002 pm2 start src/appointment-service/index.ts --interpreter ts-node --name appointment-service-4002
scripts.start:users-service: npm run start:users-service:3001 && npm run start:users-service:3002
scripts.start:appointment-service: npm run start:appointment-service:4001 && npm run start:appointment-service:4002
scripts.start: npm run start:users-service && npm run start:appointment-service
scripts.restart: pm2 restart users-service-3001 --update-env && pm2 restart users-service-3002 --update-env && pm2 restart appointment-service-4001 --update-env && pm2 restart appointment-service-4002 --update-env
